title: GORGEOUS 1 Bedroom w/Rooftop Deck + More! // Lakefront
app_fee: $30 application fee per person over 18 years of age
posting_body: ['AVAILABLE NOW -- MUST SEE!', 'Gorgeous 1 Bedroom in The Alexandria Lakefront w/Rooftop Deck', "The Alexandria built in 1923, is truly a spectacular property that sits on its' own island.", 'Poised on the west shore of Lake Merritt, the property fronts Lakeside Drive and offers a panoramic view of the lake.', 'Seismic retrofit has been completed.', 'The building is a few short blocks from Lake Chalet, Starbucks, the 19th Street BART station and the AC Transit Hub.', 'Sprouts Market, Whole Foods, and downtown Oakland are all a short walk away.', 'There is no parking at this property.', 'The unit itself is ~750 square feet and offers hardwood floors throughout, a gourmet kitchen equipped with stainless steel appliances, including a gas range, dishwasher, microwave, and refrigerator, and is pre-wired for high speed internet.', 'LEASE TERMS:', 'Rental Amount: $2,695/month (1 year lease)', 'Security deposit: $3,000', 'Owner Pays Water, Heat and Garbage', '[OPTIONAL] Individual storage locker ($50 additional per month)', '[OPTIONAL] Bike storage (1st bike FREE!', '2nd bike $25 additional per month)', '[OPTIONAL] Monkey Brains high speed internet available for additional $50/month', '1 cat OK with additional deposit of $250', 'APARTMENT HIGHLIGHTS:', '- 1 Bedroom / 1 Bathroom', '- [INCLUDED} Water, heat and garbage', '- Hardwood floors throughout', '- Multiple closets & lots of storage space', '- Custom Blinds', '- Stainless steel appliances and gas range', '- Newly remodeled', '- Cable ready', '- Internet ready', '[via Monkey Brains; $50 additional per month)', '- Individual storage locker ($50 additional per month)', '- Bike storage (1st bike FREE!', '2nd bike $25 additional per month)', '- Non-smoking unit and property', '- Cat OK with additional deposit', 'BUILDING HIGHLIGHTS:', '- Built in 1923', '- 15 Unit building', '- Seismic retrofit complete', '- Designer paint colors', '- Recently renovated common area', '- Intercom/Secure entry system', '- Private rooftop deck', '- Bike storage (1st bike FREE!', '2nd bike $25 additional per /month)', '- Coin laundry on site', 'COMMUNITY HIGHLIGHTS:', '- Across the street from Lake Merritt', '- Many shops, dining, & services', "- Saturday farmers' market", '- Easy access to 580', '- Close to AC transit, TransBay stops', '- Walk score 93', 'CONTACT:', 'Jennifer, DRE #1518364', 'Text/Call:', 'show contact info']
